name: fullstackbasico
description: Fullstack b√°sico desmonstrando o uso de angular no frontend e nestjs no backend.
author: Lucas Mella

scripts.build-all: npm --prefix ./apps/back run build && npm --prefix ./apps/front run build
scripts.start-all:dev: npm --prefix ./apps/back run start:dev & npm --prefix ./apps/front run start
scripts.start-all:prod: npm --prefix ./apps/back run start:prod & npm --prefix ./apps/front run serve:ssr:front
